long_description: Yurbuds Ironman Series BTE earphones were developed by a marathoner and triathlete with personalized sizing to stay in your ears during heavy activity and rapid movement. Patented ear-lock technology offers a secure fit, even during the most intense workouts; sweat- and rain-resistant design offers worry-free listening. Medical-grade silicone ear cushions feature recessed, molded-in grooves that help erase pressure points and offer long-lasting comfort. Clinically proven funnels channel music into your ears for great audio quality. Yurbuds Ironman Series BTE earphones feature a 3.5mm gold-plated stereo mini plug and 3.9 ft. fiber-reinforced cable.
short_description: Yurbuds Ironman Series BTE earphones were developed by a marathoner and triathlete with personalized sizing to stay in your ears during heavy activity and rapid movement.
